10.07.2003
How much should you spend on a POS system? Read more articles ..... 1
International Point of Sale brings you the best in POS hardware and software, all at an affordable price. Any type of retail store can benefit from our wide selection of products designed to make your business more profitable. We have dedicated service professionals available day and night to take care of your business needs.
What is/are your most likely method for accepting credit cards? Manually swiped cards at any retail store Manually swiped cards at a restaurant Manually swiped cards at a fast food restaurant or coffee shop By phone or through mail order Manually swiped cards at a mobile business or trade show Other How much do you currently accept, or do you anticipate accepting, in monthly charges? Under $5,000/month $5,000 - $10,000/month $10,000 - $20,000/month $20,000 - $40,000/month $40,000 - $100,000/month Over $100,000/month What is, or do you anticipate, the average individual charge amount to be? $1 - $15/transaction $15 - $50/transaction $50 - $100/transaction $100 - $500/transaction $500 - $1,000/transaction $1,000+/transaction Business Name(DBA): Products/Services Description: Contact Name: Mr. Mrs. Ms. Dr. Rev.
